title: 1907 Hughie and His Tigers Taylor Postcard
author: stclaircards

posts.post_title: 1907 Hughie and His Tigers Taylor Postcard
posts.post_content:
Card has been postally used.  Postmarked 1907.
No creasing, does have some hinge discoloration (see photos).
$SOLD net to me via PAYPAL.
Price includes shipping/insurance within US.

[URL=http://s1175.photobucket.com/user/shawnstclair1/media/016_zpsi7om7xr6.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1175.photobucket.com/albums/r633/shawnstclair1/016_zpsi7om7xr6.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://s1175.photobucket.com/user/shawnstclair1/media/018_zpsn5ywaq4o.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1175.photobucket.com/albums/r633/shawnstclair1/018_zpsn5ywaq4o.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://s1175.photobucket.com/user/shawnstclair1/media/017_zpsdvqnu0db.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1175.photobucket.com/albums/r633/shawnstclair1/017_zpsdvqnu0db.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Nice card!

Wish I would have looked earlier today. :(
